text: NCAA Award of Valor is an award presented by NCAA (National Collegiate Athletic Association) in order to recognize "courageous action or noteworthy bravery" by individuals who are involved with intercollegiate athletics. ==Notable recipients== * 1974: Lefty Driesell * 1982: Timothy McCarthy * 1984: Joe Delaney * 2004: Jimmy Baxter * 2008: Emily Perez * 2008: Douglas A. Zembiec * 2009: Roxana Saberi Source: ==References== Category:Sports trophies and awards
title: NCAA Award of Valor
